resources.string: Nevis Mobile Authentication Coroutines Example App

For security reasons the application requires lock screen to be enabled.\nPlease enable it in the System Settings.
This device is not supported by the application. The device does not allow storing data securely.
We were not able to verify your identity.
Security data was deleted.\nPlease register again.
The authentication timed out, please try again.
For security reasons, you were locked out. You need to define a new PIN before being able to authenticate again.
For security reasons, you were locked out.\n\nIn order to unlock your authenticator please go to the System Settings.
Your phone is experiencing network issues. Please try again later when you have better data connectivity.
A technical error occurred.\nPlease try again.

Your selected authentication option is no longer accepted. This is most likely because it was removed from your online profile. To use another authentication option please deactivate this one first in the application Settings.
We were not able to verify your identity.\n%1$s
Could not decrypt the contents of the message.\n\nCheck that the device you use is the one registered for this application.
You have tried to authenticate twice using the same push notification or QR code.\nPlease try again requesting a new QR code or push notification.
Before using the fingerprint authenticator, you must define your fingerprint in the System Settings.
Your fingerprint authenticator is not available because the fingerprint was disabled or modified in the System Settings. To be able to use the application again please contact support.
Error validating the facet ID of the server. Contact support if the problem persists.
We were not able to verify your identity.
Security data was deleted.\nPlease register again.
